original_text: in order that the righteous requirement of the law might be fully met in us, who do not live according to the flesh but according to the Spirit.
korean_text: 육신을 따르지 않고 그 영을 따라 행하는 우리에게 율법의 요구가 이루어지게 하려 하심이니라

sentences.original_text: in order that the righteous requirement of the law
might be fully met in us,
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 안에서 온전히 이루어지게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: who do not live according to the flesh
